name: Music Gateway
slogan: B2B Marketplace & Cloud Storage for music & creative professionals
description:
B2B marketplace for the Music Industry & Creative Professionals worldwide
Cloud File Storage for creatives (think dropbox, but designed for creatives)
Music sync licensing agent, helping place music into TV, Film, Games & Adverts

team.title: Customer Success Manager
team.name: Jonathan Bond
team.bioHtml: I'm an experienced startup warrior who's looking to expand his knowledge in the world of CX and CSM to establish myself further within the SaaS world.

jobs.title: Frontend Web Developer / UI + UX (Music Gateway
jobs.description:
Music Gateway is a market leading, SaaS product for the music and creative industries. The platform educates the independent music market in standard business practices whilst offering a wide range of tools & opportunities to help individuals and companies succeed including major clients including Universal, BMG, Redbull and more.

We are looking to expand our technical team with an enthusiastic UX/UI Web Developer who has a passion for combining the art of design with the art of programming. A passion for front-end development is a must along with the desire to achieve good design, usability, accessibility, performance, and mobile/responsive web pages.

Key Responsibilities:

Create world-class products and experiences that make people's lives simply better
Increase the number of users regularly interacting with the products through ease of use
Development of new user-facing features and improvement of existing features
Translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual and responsive UI components
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Cooperation with the back-end developers
The ideal candidate should demonstrate a good understanding of working in an office environment with the ability to be self-motivated, self-managed and highly organised. The role will also give the successful candidate the opportunity to make a huge impact on the UI & UX design for a leading music industry SAAS product as well as cross train using in-demand technologies like Laravel and Vue.

Personal Attributes:

Great communicator
Passionate about their work and self-development
Appreciative of the value of time and uses it effectively
Design Skills and Knowledge:

Strong eye for design and finishing touches
Attention to detail
Strong understanding of User Experience best practices
Programming Skills and Knowledge:

HTML
CSS (SASS, SCSS & LESS)
Responsive CSS frameworks (Semantic UI, Bulma or Bootstrap)
Javascript, Jquery
Demonstrable web development skills with a strong portfolio
Smarty PHP / Blade or other templating
GIT
Advantageous traits and knowledge:

Understanding of sales funnels / commercial awareness
Knockout JS (we’re migrating away from this)
Vue / React (we’re migrating to Vue)
OOP PHP MVC
Laravel (we’re migrating to Laravel)
SAAS experience
E-commerce experience
Any other programming/design experience
Hobby projects/side hustles
Interest in the music industry
Job Type: Full-time

jobs.title: PHP Developer (Laravel) - Music, TV, Film
jobs.description:
Music Gateway is a market-leading, SaaS product for the music and creative industries. The platform educates the independent music market in standard business practices whilst offering a wide range of tools & opportunities to help individuals and companies succeed including major clients including Universal, BMG, Redbull and more.

We are looking to expand our technical team with an PHP Developer who has a passion for creating cool products and clean code. We are moving to Laravel shortly, but the existing stack is using a similar custom framework. The team are young, social and the working environment is casual & fun. Our offices are based in the heart of Reigate Town, which is a short walk from Reigate station.

Key Responsibilities:

Create world-class products and experiences that make people's lives simply better
Increase the number of users regularly interacting with the products through ease of use
Development of new user-facing features and improvement of existing features
Cooperation with the frontend developers
The ideal candidate should demonstrate a good understanding of working in an office environment with the ability to be self-motivated, self-managed and highly organised. The role will also give the successful candidate the opportunity to make a huge impact on the product development going forward and help us maintain our position as a leading music industry SaaS product as well as cross-train using in-demand technologies like Laravel and Vue.

Personal Attributes:

Great communicator
Passionate about their work and self-development
Appreciative of the value of time and uses it effectively
Design Skills and Knowledge:

Strong eye for design and finishing touches
Attention to detail
Strong understanding of User Experience best practices
Programming Skills and Knowledge:

Knockout JS (we’re migrating away from this)
Vue / React (we’re migrating to Vue)
OOP PHP MVC
Laravel (we’re migrating to Laravel)
HTML
CSS (SASS, SCSS & LESS)
Responsive CSS frameworks (Semantic UI, Bulma or Bootstrap)
Javascript, Jquery
Demonstrable web development skills with a strong portfolio
Smarty PHP / Blade or other templating
GIT

Advantageous traits and knowledge:

Understanding of sales funnels / commercial awareness
SAAS experience
E-commerce experience
Any other programming/design experience
Hobby projects/side hustles
Interest in the music industry & creative industries
